original_title: Hilton Colombo wins SLIM Kantar People’s Hotel Brand of the Year
original_body_lines: Colombo, Sri Lanka (03 April 2023) – At the recent SLIM Kantar People’s Awards 2023 ceremony held at the Monarch Imperial, Hilton Colombo, a hotel with a 35-year history in the capital city, received the esteemed “SLIM Kantar People’s Hotel Brand of the Year” award for the second consecutive year. The event was graced by the presence of Dimuth Karunaratne, the captain of the Sri Lankan Test cricket team, in addition to well-known actors, actresses, artists, and public figures.

The Sri Lanka Institute of Marketing (SLIM) bestowed an award to Hilton Colombo, which was determined by the people’s choice over a period of 12 months. What distinguishes this award from others is that they are based on consumer preferences, ascertained through survey results rather than being determined by a group of specialists. SLIM administers the awards, bolstered by the outcomes of the survey. This is the second occasion that Hilton Colombo has been honored with this award.

“We are thrilled and immensely grateful to be bestowed with the prestigious People’s hotel brand of the year award, which not only reflects our guests’ unwavering trust and loyalty but also acknowledges our marketing team’s tireless efforts to keep our brand uplifted and relevant. This award motivates us to continue pushing the boundaries of hospitality excellence and to elevate our guests’ experiences to new heights. We thank our guests for their continued support and promise to always put them at the heart of everything we do.” said Iromal Perera, Cluster Marketing & Communications Director for Hilton in Sri Lanka.

For over 100 years, Hilton Hotels & Resorts has set the benchmark for hospitality around the world, providing new product innovations and services to meet guests’ evolving needs. With close to 600 hotels across six continents, Hilton Hotels & Resorts properties are located in the world’s most sought-after destinations for guests who know that where they stay matters. Hilton Honors members who book directly through preferred Hilton channels have access to instant benefits. Begin your journey at www.hilton.com, and learn more by visiting newsroom.hilton.com/hhr or following Hilton Hotels & Resorts on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

Hilton (NYSE: HLT) is a leading global hospitality company with a portfolio of 17 world-class brands comprising close to 7000 properties with over 1,061,686 rooms, in 122 countries and territories. Dedicated to fulfilling its mission to be the world’s most hospitable company, Hilton earned a spot on the 2021 world’s best workplaces list, and has welcomed more than 3 billion guests in its century-long history. Through the award-winning guest loyalty program Hilton Honors, more than 85 million members who book directly with Hilton have access to instant benefits, including digital check-in with room selection, Digital Key, and Connected Room. Visit newsroom.hilton.com for more information, and connect with Hilton on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram and YouTube.
